text: The Catfish Museum and Welcome Center is a museum about the catfish industry in Belzoni, Mississippi. ==Location== The museum is located in a former IB&B; Depot at 111 Magnolia Street in Belzoni, Humphreys County, Mississippi.Belzoni-Humphreys Development FoundationU.S. Gulf Coast States Geotourism MapGuide ==Overview== The museum tells the story of the catfish industry in Humphreys County, Mississippi. Inside, there are exhibitions and a video. Outside, there are sculptures by Mississippi artists. ==References== Category:Museums in Humphreys County, Mississippi Category:Fish and humans
title: Catfish Museum and Welcome Center
